decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The permission hereby granted shall be for a limited period expiring on 26th October 2019 when the use shall cease.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Planning Statement, 1207/10/4A, site location plan. Received: 31st August 2016
Crash report and Highways Statement. Received: 11th October 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No member of the public shall be permitted to visit the site and no vehicle sales shall be undertaken there.
description: Variation of condition 1 (limited period of use) of planning permission 01054/AN/P18 dated 09/09/13 to allow the extension for the temporary use of the site for B8 vehicle storage use for a further three years
